about-intro: Hello! Welcome to my portfolio & about website! Do you have any questions? Feel free to ask me on Discord!
about-who-desc: I am a 17 years old student, studying information technology at high school. I live in Bergen, Norway. Technically I am also half Dutch since my father is from the Netherlands. Even though I don't speak the language very well, I do understand a lot. I also drive an MT-125. In Norway, you can actually take the license for A1 at 16.
about-what-desc: I mainly code, play video games, and hang out with friends. The things I do the most are programming and gaming, as most of my friends are online. My favourite video games are Apex Legends, Phasmophobia, Subnautica, and Hearts of Iron IV. I also have some interest for table tennis (also known as ping pong) and chess. I have a big interest for chess, my current rating is around 1200.
